info.title: Laravel Shopify API
info.description: RESTful API for managing Shopify products and variants with GraphQL integration

post.summary: Login user and generate API token
Refresh API token (create new token and revoke old one)

get.description: Quick health check to verify API is running
Comprehensive health check including database, Shopify, and storage

503.description: One or more services are unhealthy

get.description: Check database connectivity and basic operations
Check Shopify API connectivity and authentication

post.description: Create a new product and sync it to Shopify. All operations are wrapped in a database transaction.

body_html.example: High quality cotton t-shirt with premium print

500.description: Internal Server Error - Shopify sync failed

message.example: Shopify API Error: Product creation failed

put.description: Update an existing product and sync changes to Shopify

500.description: Internal Server Error - Shopify sync failed

delete.description: Soft delete a product locally and remove it from Shopify if it exists

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Force delete from Shopify even if local soft delete fails

500.description: Internal Server Error - Shopify deletion failed

message.example: Failed to delete product from Shopify

post.description: Create multiple products in a single request

skip_errors.description: Continue processing even if some products fail

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query for title, description, vendor, SKU

Get available filter options and their counts

parameters.description: Pagination cursor for fetching next page

500.description: Internal Server Error - Shopify API error

post.description: Export a local product to Shopify (creates new or updates existing)

parameters.name: force_create
parameters.description: Force create new product even if shopify_product_id exists

post.description: Bulk export products to Shopify (operates in background)

skip_failed.description: Continue processing if some products fail

get.description: Get comprehensive sync status between local database and Shopify
